description:
Luffy and his crew stumble upon a most peculiar village when they hitch a ride on a fire-breathing beetle. The natives are petrified of pirates, but they welcome the Straw Hats with open arms!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Special Presentation Related to the Movie! A Gold Lion`s Ambition on the Move!
Eiga Rendou Special: Ugokidasu Kinjishi no Yabou
Special Strong World : Les ambitions du Lion d’Or sont en marche !
Он делает свой ход! Амбиции Киндзиси
عرض خاصّ مرتبط بالفيلم: بداية تحرّك طموح الأسد الذّهبيّ
映画連動特別編[スペシャル] 動き出す金獅子の野望
